body:
Hello,


My question is about the electric lighting zone control. After the 
critical point is defined you can select the SET ELECTRIC button to 
define the dimmed or switched ligthing control. For this, you need to 
import a photosensor distribution file, that is an archive (.sen). My 
question is: where can I find it? How is the format of this distribution 
file? In the Daysimps-Manual is not specified.


Thank you for your help.
___
